sentences.en: A plane trailing a banner was circling overhead.
sentences.cn: 一架飞机拖着横幅标语在上空盘旋。

sentences.en: A small brown fawn hopped across the trail in front of them.
sentences.cn: 一只棕色的小鹿蹦跳着穿过他们面前的那条小路。

sentences.en: a trail of blood
sentences.cn: 一连串血迹

sentences.en: Adam stumbles on, leaving a trail of devastation in his wake.
sentences.cn: 亚当蹒跚而行，沿路留下毁坏的痕迹。

sentences.en: Criminals are very reluctant to leave a paper trail.
sentences.cn: 罪犯非常不愿意留下案底。

sentences.en: Everywhere in the house was a sticky trail of orange juice.
sentences.cn: 家里到处是泼洒的橙汁留下的黏糊糊的痕迹.

sentences.en: He left a trail of clues at the scenes of his crimes.
sentences.cn: 他在犯罪现场留下了一些蛛丝马迹.

sentences.en: He let his fingers trail in the water.
sentences.cn: 他把手伸进水里，任水流滑过指间。

sentences.en: He was following a broad trail through the trees.
sentences.cn: 他沿着林间的一条阔路行进。

sentences.en: I vote that you try to pick out the trail for us.
sentences.cn: 我提议由你来选我们该走哪条小路。

sentences.en: Police trailed the gang for several days.
sentences.cn: 警察跟踪了那个团伙好几天。

sentences.en: She was rather cross about having to trail across London.
sentences.cn: 她不得不疲惫地步行穿过伦敦，这让她相当生气。

sentences.en: The bus left a trail of black smoke behind it.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车开过，留下一股黑烟。

sentences.en: The hunters lost the tiger’s trail in the middle of the jungle.
sentences.cn: 猎人们在丛林深处失去了老虎的踪迹。

sentences.en: The police were hot on his trail.
sentences.cn: 警方正全力追捕他。

sentences.en: The trail led over Boulder Pass before descending to a lake.
sentences.cn: 小路越过博尔德山口，然后向下通往湖边。

sentences.en: The trail was steep and thick with underbrush.
sentences.cn: 那条小路非常陡峭，而且长满了灌木丛。

sentences.en: There was a newspaper on the trail of the story.
sentences.cn: 有一家报纸在追踪报道此事。

sentences.en: These surgeons have blazed the trail in the treatment of bomb victims.
sentences.cn: 这些外科医生在治疗炸伤方面开辟了新的道路。

sentences.en: When entering a trail or starting a descent, yield to other skiers.
sentences.cn: 进入滑雪道或开始下滑时，要给其他滑雪者让路。
